channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek After Dark #22 – Magic the Gathering, Alexa using Lua, and Steam Box

item.title: By: Jerejigga
item.dc:creator: Jerejigga
item.description: I also searched the forums and could not find an updated AutoLAN library.
item.content:encoded: I also searched the forums and could not find an updated AutoLAN library.

item.title: By: Adam
item.dc:creator: Adam
item.description: Hi Scott, Good to hear of the Autolan update. I've had a quick look on the forums but couldn't find it. Would you please post a link? Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi Scott,
Good to hear of the Autolan update. I’ve had a quick look on the forums but couldn’t find it. Would you please post a link?
Thanks

item.title: By: scottrules44
item.dc:creator: scottrules44
item.description: Maybe they will use it to make some smart cases. Maybe make a better battery case.
item.content:encoded: Maybe they will use it to make some smart cases. Maybe make a better battery case.

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Thanks, Scott. What do you think the iPad Pro connector on an iPhone would be used for? As for Google social media, they should focus on making resources easy to share and facilitate communications for productivity. It's a tighter, more business centric definition of social media and that makes more sense for Google.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Scott. What do you think the iPad Pro connector on an iPhone would be used for? As for Google social media, they should focus on making resources easy to share and facilitate communications for productivity. It’s a tighter, more business centric definition of social media and that makes more sense for Google.

item.title: By: Scott
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description:
Also I have updated auto lan plugin which is peer to peer over local wifi
You can find it on the fourms
item.content:encoded:
Also I have updated auto lan plugin which is peer to peer over local wifi

item.title: By: scottrules44
item.dc:creator: scottrules44
item.description:
Just some notes: IPhone 7 if rumors are true will have two connectors. 1. Lightning 2. The little connecter for the iPad Pro that use the keyboard
Also Google is getting back into social media with groups app they launched.
item.content:encoded:
Just some notes: IPhone 7 if rumors are true will have two connectors. 1. Lightning 2. The little connecter for the iPad Pro that use the keyboard

Also Google is getting back into social media with groups app they launched.
